17 namespace TiledArray {
18 
19 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
20 inline void cuda_initialize() {
23  cudaEnv::instance();
24  //
25  cuBLASHandlePool::handle();
26  // initialize cuTT
27  cuttInitialize();
28 }
29 
31 inline void cuda_finalize() {
32  CudaSafeCall(cudaDeviceSynchronize());
33  cuttFinalize();
34  cublasDestroy(cuBLASHandlePool::handle());
35  delete &cuBLASHandlePool::handle();
36  cudaEnv::instance().reset(nullptr);
37 }
38 #endif
39 
40 namespace detail {
41 static bool& initialized_madworld_accessor() {
42  static bool flag = false;
43  return flag;
44 }
45 static bool initialized_madworld() { return initialized_madworld_accessor(); }
46 static bool& initialized_accessor() {
47  static bool flag = false;
48  return flag;
49 }
50 static bool& finalized_accessor() {
51  static bool flag = false;
52  return flag;
53 }
54 } // namespace detail
55 
58 static bool initialized() { return detail::initialized_accessor(); }
59 
61 static bool finalized() { return detail::finalized_accessor(); }
62 
70 
72 
75 inline World& initialize(int& argc, char**& argv,
76  const SafeMPI::Intracomm& comm, bool quiet = true) {
77  if (detail::initialized_madworld() && finalized())
78  throw Exception(
79  "TiledArray finalized MADWorld already, cannot re-initialize MADWorld "
80  "again");
81  if (!initialized()) {
82  if (!madness::initialized())
83  detail::initialized_madworld_accessor() = true;
84  else { // if MADWorld initialized, we must assume that comm is its default
85  // World.
86  if (madness::World::is_default(comm))
87  throw Exception(
88  "MADWorld initialized before TiledArray::initialize(argc, argv, "
89  "comm), but not initialized with comm");
90  }
91  auto& default_world = detail::initialized_madworld()
92  ? madness::initialize(argc, argv, comm, quiet)
93  : *madness::World::find_instance(comm);
94  TiledArray::set_default_world(default_world);
95 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
96  TiledArray::cuda_initialize();
97 #endif
98  madness::print_meminfo_disable();
99  detail::initialized_accessor() = true;
100  return default_world;
101  } else
102  throw Exception("TiledArray already initialized");
103 }
104 
105 inline World& initialize(int& argc, char**& argv, bool quiet = true) {
106  return TiledArray::initialize(argc, argv, SafeMPI::COMM_WORLD, quiet);
107 }
108 
109 inline World& initialize(int& argc, char**& argv, const MPI_Comm& comm,
110  bool quiet = true) {
111  return TiledArray::initialize(argc, argv, SafeMPI::Intracomm(comm), quiet);
112 }
113 
115 
118 inline void finalize() {
119 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
120  TiledArray::cuda_finalize();
121 #endif
122  TiledArray::get_default_world()
123  .gop.fence(); // TODO remove when madness::finalize() fences
124  if (detail::initialized_madworld()) {
125  madness::finalize();
126  }
127  TiledArray::reset_default_world();
128  detail::initialized_accessor() = false;
129  detail::finalized_accessor() = true;
130 }
131 
132 } // namespace TiledArray
